cards.card_name: Twin Lis of the Divine Realm
cards.rules_text:
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has double strike.
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, put that many plus one +1/+1 counters on that creature instead.

Vigilance
Whenever Lijing, the True Divinity or another nontoken creature you control enters, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 white Fox Spirit creature token.
• Invigorate 1. [i](Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]

Hexproof
Whenever another creature you control becomes the target of a spell an opponent controls, you may submerge that creature. [i](To submerge a card, exile it, then put it on the battlefield face down under its owner's control as a 2/2 creature.)[/i]
{1}{U}{U}: Turn target face-down creature you control face up.

Trample
When Shigurei, the Floodbringer enters, up to three target permanents become colorless Island lands.

Tzelin of the Demon Realm can't block.
Whenever a Demon you control enters, you may pay {B}. If you do, return Tzelin from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

Flying
When Lizhao, Lord of the Yaogu enters, you may put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield tapped and under your control.
When Lizhao dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
Revive {3}{B}{B} [i]({3}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)[/i]

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {2}{R}{R}. If you do, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying and haste. Exile that token at end of combat.
[i]Ferocious[/i] — Whenever Xiusheng of the Dragon Realm attacks, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Xiusheng gains double strike until end of turn.

Flying, trample
Whenever Hao'Tai, the Ancient One deals combat damage to a player, exile the top four cards of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast instant, sorcery, and creature cards from among those exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.

{G}{G}: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
{1}{G}{G}: Create Shimaru, the White Wolf, a legendary 3/3 green Wolf creature token with hexproof.
{2}{G}{G}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

Alpha [i](You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. If you do, it becomes alpha and can only attack alone.)[/i]
Vigilance, reach, trample
{4}{G}{G}, Exile Qiyan, Serpent of Seven Heads from your graveyard: Create seven 1/1 green Snake creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gets -9/-0.
[-2]: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put any number of cards with mana abilities from among them into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of each opponent's end step, gain control of target creature that player controls.”

[+1]: Until your next turn, if a source would deal damage to Heping, Master Arbitrator, prevent all but 1 of that damage.
[-2]: Create a white Aura enchantment token named Pacifism attached to target creature an opponent controls. It has enchant creature and “Enchanted creature can't attack or block.”
[-8]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of your end step, your life total becomes 20.”

[0]: Sacrifice a creature. When you do, Xiong Mao, Survivalist deals damage to any target equal to that creature's power, then put a number of loyalty counters on Xiong Mao equal to that creature's toughness.
[-2]: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature you control dies, you may draw cards equal to its power, then you may gain life equal to its toughness.”

cards.rules_text: Exile all cards from your graveyard. You may search your library for any number of instant and/or sorcery cards with different names that share a name with one or more cards exiled this way and cast them without paying their mana costs, then shuffle. Exile Infuse the Apparatus.
Each player chooses up to one permanent they control of each permanent type, then sacrifices the rest. [i](The permanent types are artifact, creature, enchantment, land, and planeswalker.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Yes, your children are all very adorable. Now pick one.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
First strike
Creatures with power greater than Gao'Wu, Master Soothsayer's power can't attack.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I seek no collar, nor trophy of my triumph. Just peace.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Diao, Dragoon Captain enters, create three 1/1 red and white Warrior creature tokens.
Whenever a creature you control attacks, invigorate 1. [i](Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]

Lifelink
Whenever a creature with power less than Kiri, Cloudwalker's power you control enters, you may pay {W}. If you do, you gain 2 life and draw a card.

Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one —
• Other creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
• Other creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.

Alpha [i](You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. If you do, it becomes alpha and can only attack alone.)[/i]
Flying
{2}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by creatures with counters on them this turn.

Whenever a creature you control enters, create an Idol token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
{2}, Sacrifice an Idol: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
Destroy all nonlegendary creatures.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Once a millennium, the goliaths remind the populace why they remain in power.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Exile target nontoken creature. That creature's controller creates X 1/1 red and white Warrior creature tokens, where X is that creature's mana value.
cards.flavor_text: [i]When an incident occurs, the Folded Fan measures its severity and responds in accord.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Invigorate 5. [i](Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put five +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]As the sunlight radiated off of her fair skin and the wind wisped through her silken hair, the rest of the battalion soon realized that she was no longer their equal.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, up to one other target creature has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets exactly one creature they don't control, you may copy that spell. If you do, you may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor_text: [i]He dances with the radiance of a sunbeam and the whimsy of a rainbow.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter it unless that player pays {1} for each spell cast before it this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I beg, forget your alacrity. Stop and admire nature's grandiosity.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Shojiro, the Wavewaker enters, submerge up to eight target creatures your opponents control. [i](To submerge a card, exile it, then put it on the battlefield face down under its owner's control as a 2/2 creature.)[/i]

If a creature entering the battlefield under your control causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
{1}{U}, {T}: Exile another target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

Create two Idol tokens, then counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each Idol you control. [i](They're artifacts with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Submerge each creature you control. At the beginning of the next end step, you may turn any number of face down creatures you control face up. [i](To submerge a card, exile it, then put it on the battlefield face down under its owner's control as a 2/2 creature.)[/i]

Gain control of target creature with the least power among creatures on the battlefield, then invigorate 2. [i](Choose a creature with the least power among creatures you control and put two +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]

Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them into your graveyard or back on top of your library in any order.
Draw two cards.
At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card and you lose 1 life. Then if you have six or fewer cards in hand, sacrifice a creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]If it isn't painful, it isn't worth her time.[/i]
